title: Bank of Singapore Buys Stake in Maskapai Reasuransi Indonesia Tbk (MREI.JK)
body: Bank of Singapore LIMITED bought 111,000 shares of Maskapai Reasuransi Indonesia Tbk (MREI.JK) on September 10, 2025, with the price range undisclosed. This transaction increased the bank's holdings from 31,393,355 to 31,504,355 shares, representing a 0.35% change. The purchase slightly boosted the bank's stake in the company, as reported by the Indonesian stock exchange.

title: Bank of Singapore Buys Stake in Maskapai Reasuransi Indonesia Tbk (MREI.JK)
body: Bank of Singapore LIMITED bought 150,000 shares of Maskapai Reasuransi Indonesia Tbk (MREI.JK) on September 10, 2025, with the price range undisclosed. This transaction increased their holdings from 31,504,355 to 31,654,355 shares, a 0.48% change. The purchase is disclosed through the Indonesian Stock Exchange.

title: Trukindo Persada Sejahtera Sells Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) Stake
body: Trukindo Persada Sejahtera sold its entire stake in Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk on September 09, 2025, with a total volume of 54,750,200 shares at an undisclosed price range. This transaction resulted in a change of ownership from 54,750,200 shares to 0, representing a delta of -54,750,200 shares or -100.00%. The sale is now recorded on the Indonesian Stock Exchange website.

title: PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya Reduces Stake in Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK)
body: On September 09, 2025, PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya reduces 3.371.700 shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) at an undisclosed price, shifting ownership from 89.072.800 to 85.701.100 (Δ -3.371.700 / -3.79%). The change appears in the latest IDX ownership filing.

title: PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya Accumulates Stake in Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK)
body: On September 09, 2025, PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya accumulates 17.582.100 shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) at an undisclosed price, shifting ownership from 85.701.100 to 103.283.200 (Δ 17.582.100 / 20.52%). The change appears in the latest IDX ownership filing.

title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Accumulates PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) Shares
body: On September 09, 2025, Patrick Rudolf Dannacher accumulates 490.800 shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at IDR 955–970 per share, shifting ownership from 81.173.950 to 81.664.750 (Δ 490.800 / 0.60%). The change appears in the latest IDX ownership filing.

title: PT Futura Energi Global Tbk (FUTR.JK): PT Aurora Dhana Nusantara buys shares
body: On September 10, 2025, PT Aurora Dhana Nusantara buys 2.985.998.000 shares of PT Futura Energi Global Tbk (FUTR.JK) at ≈ IDR 11 per share, shifting ownership from 0 to 2.985.998.000 (Δ 2.985.998.000). The movement is recorded in recent IDX ownership disclosures.

title: PT SAMUEL TUMBUH BERSAMA Sells Stake in PT Nusantara Sawit Sejahtera Tbk (NSSS.JK)
body: On September 11, 2025, PT SAMUEL TUMBUH BERSAMA sells 50.266.000 shares of PT Nusantara Sawit Sejahtera Tbk (NSSS.JK) at ≈ IDR 404 per share, shifting ownership from 8.586.343.600 to 8.536.077.600 (Δ -50.266.000 / -0.59%). The disclosure was filed with the Indonesia Stock Exchange.

title: PT Bank Central Asia Tbk. (BBCA.JK): Jahja Setiaatmadja buys shares
body: On September 10, 2025, Jahja Setiaatmadja buys 66.000 shares of PT Bank Central Asia Tbk. (BBCA.JK) at ≈ IDR 7.575 per share, shifting ownership from 34.867.644 to 34.933.644 (Δ 66.000 / 0.19%). The change appears in the latest IDX ownership filing.

title: PT Hillcon Equity Management Cuts PT Hillcon Tbk (HILL.JK) Shares
body: On September 10, 2025, PT Hillcon Equity Management cuts 205.000.000 shares of PT Hillcon Tbk (HILL.JK) at ≈ IDR 260 per share, shifting ownership from 7.793.513.000 to 7.588.513.000 (Δ -205.000.000 / -2.63%). The change appears in the latest IDX ownership filing.

title: Bani Maulana Mulia Accumulates Samudera Indonesia Tbk (SMDR.JK) Shares
body: On September 11, 2025, Bani Maulana Mulia accumulates 606.100 shares of Samudera Indonesia Tbk (SMDR.JK) at IDR 326–328 per share, shifting ownership from 53.191.700 to 53.797.800 (Δ 606.100 / 1.14%). The change appears in the latest IDX ownership filing.

title: Green Era Energy Pte. Ltd. Reduces Stake in PT Barito Renewables Energy Tbk. (BREN.JK)
body: On September 10, 2025, Green Era Energy Pte. Ltd. reduces 87.674.300 shares of PT Barito Renewables Energy Tbk. (BREN.JK) at IDR 8.350–8.500 per share, shifting ownership from 29.541.107.900 to 29.453.433.600 (Δ -87.674.300 / -0.30%). The movement is recorded in recent IDX ownership disclosures.

title: PT Segar Kumala Indonesia Tbk (BUAH.JK): Hendro Susilo buys shares
body: On September 10, 2025, Hendro Susilo buys 2.000.000 shares of PT Segar Kumala Indonesia Tbk (BUAH.JK) at ≈ IDR 1.400 per share, shifting ownership from 363.000.000 to 365.000.000 (Δ 2.000.000 / 0.55%). The change appears in the latest IDX ownership filing.

title: PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK): Bima Kurniawan sells shares
body: On September 10, 2025, Bima Kurniawan sells 400.000 shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) at IDR 995–1.000 per share, shifting ownership from 25.169.100 to 24.769.100 (Δ -400.000 / -1.59%). The disclosure was filed with the Indonesia Stock Exchange.
